description: Brand identity for Casper's Kitchen ghost kitchen

guidelines.name: Casper's Kitchen
guidelines.tone: Warm, friendly, magical, cozy - inspired by Studio Ghibli's inviting food scenes

description: Color palette combining Databricks warmth with Ghibli coziness

primary.name: Ember Orange
primary.usage: CTAs, highlights, warmth accents - evokes glowing kitchen fire

secondary.name: Hearth Red
secondary.usage: Logo accent, hover states, important links

light.name: Warm Cream
light.usage: Main background - like aged paper or warm kitchen walls

dark.name: Night Kitchen
dark.usage: Dark mode background - cozy evening atmosphere

forest.name: Garden Green
forest.usage: Fresh ingredients, nature elements, success states

description: Typography system with warm, readable fonts

headings.family: Fraunces or similar serif with personality
headings.style: Slightly playful, hand-crafted feel without being childish

body.style: Clean and readable with generous line height

illustrations.style: Soft, hand-drawn quality inspired by Ghibli backgrounds
elements: Gentle steam wisps rising from dishes
Nature touches: leaves, small plants, vegetables
illustrations.colors: Muted, warm palette with occasional bright food accents

icons.style: Rounded, friendly stroke icons with 2px weight

photography.style: Warm-toned, soft lighting, overhead and 45-degree angles
photography.mood: Inviting, steam visible, natural imperfections welcome
photography.avoid: Overly styled, cold lighting, stark white backgrounds

patterns.texture: Subtle paper grain or canvas texture on backgrounds
patterns.decorative: Simple geometric patterns inspired by kitchen tiles

principles: Movements should feel organic and gentle, never jarring
Like steam rising or soup simmering - natural, soothing
Micro-interactions add delight without slowing the user

animations.hovers: Soft scale (1.02-1.05) with warm shadow growth
animations.buttons: Subtle press effect, warm glow on active

specialEffects.steam: CSS animated wisps on hot food items
specialEffects.sparkle: Occasional subtle sparkle on featured items
specialEffects.parallax: Gentle parallax on hero background elements

cards.style: Soft shadows, rounded corners (12-16px), warm background
cards.hover: Lift effect with warmer shadow, subtle border glow

buttons.primary: Ember orange gradient, rounded-full, warm shadow
buttons.secondary: Outlined with wood brown, filled on hover

inputs.style: Soft borders, cream background, warm focus ring

navigation.style: Clean with warm accents, logo prominently displayed

logoMark.concept: Friendly ghost character holding/wearing a chef's hat
logoMark.style: Simple, rounded, approachable - think Ghibli's Totoro meets chef

guidelines.clearSpace: Minimum clear space equal to height of 'C' in Casper's

colors.primary: Ember orange on light, warm cream on dark

guidelines.contrast: Minimum 4.5:1 for body text, 3:1 for large text
guidelines.focus: Visible, warm-colored focus indicators on all interactive elements
guidelines.alternatives: Alt text for all illustrations describing mood and content
